website_summaries.verdict: Best blend of value and features you'll find in a Vitamix.
pros: Best buy when it comes to Vitamix blenders – lacks a few bells and whistles but still an excellent-quality blender
Container is a nice size at 64 ounces
cons: Comes with no accessories, and they're expensive to buy individually

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The motor is so unbalanced, the blender walks across my kitchen counter. Way too loud at full power. A faint electrical burning smell comes out of the blender when used. The power cord retention system seems like it was designed in the 60's. It works, but barely and poorly. I'm getting rid of this and going back to a Breville hemisphere control.
customer_reviews.author: Brettski

customer_reviews.title: Not the expected Vitamix quality
customer_reviews.text: We don't know if this was an "undocumented refurb" or not, but it broke within 2 months of receipt! Perfect timing for them, not so good for us.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice and after using and discarding numerous other blenders I may have found the correct one to use. First use; Had a moment of absolute dim witlessness and left a metal spoon in the blender. Completely my fault. Called Vitamix customer service and got a free replacement canister and spatulas on the warranty free shipping, such a deal. Also bought the shorter canister and am happily using this blender daily. Most satisfied with this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Motor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2006.... Excellent. Modern versions of this... CHEAP! This is the second return due to burnt plastic smell from the Base unit. Now it won't turn on after waiting over an hour for the "cool down" period... an approx. $400 blender that burns out on the first try... time to bring mfg. back to the states.
customer_reviews.author: M. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Blade keeps stopping when machine is on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender in Oct 2016 so it’s a year and a half old and every time I try and blend I have to switch on and off over and over because the blade stops spinning ☹️ Really dissapointed and will have to buy a new blender. I though Vitamix were supposed to be great reliable blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Julienne Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it I saved for a year to add it to my kitchen. I end up taking things out and putting it in my nutri bullet. It stops all the time. You end up not being able to get hand ofbthe food out of the bottom around the blades. Frozen fruit forget about it unless you add too much liquid. It hasn’t ever worked properly. My cheap blender beats it every time. I am hoping it’s just a bad one. After 8 months of trying to love it and NOT I am calling the company for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tawyana Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month: updated
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product less than a month. I've only used it for smoothies. It's broke. My smoothie tasted like burnt metal. I made another with different ingredients. It tasted the same. Wow. What a waste of money and energy. *They replaced it, and it's been fine!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kubly

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend anything
customer_reviews.text: My old Vitamix pulverized everything, this model has difficulty blending a simple smoothie
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaRedinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating my review. After 7 months of light use the blender brock. The Vitamix has a 7yars warranty so hopefully, they can repair it. I how to pay for the shipping, which is not going to be cheap because the product is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ilias

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money buy from Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 4.5 months. Really expensive to use for so short.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Maraist

customer_reviews.title: THE VITAMIX 760 ACCELERATOR/TAMPER TOOL IS NOT NEEDED FOR VITAMIX 5200
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: Your Vitamix 5200 Blender has a Vitamix 760 accelerator/Tamper Tool INCLUDED. I had to pay $5.99 to return this extra unused tool.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE's Wife

customer_reviews.title: A working VitaMix is a beautiful thing.
customer_reviews.text: A working VitaMix is a beautiful thing. The operative word is “working”. I got my (new, not reconditioned) model 5200 in January 2020 and used it once or twice a week. Two months later it stopped working. I sent it in to VitaMix for repair. After that, it lasted another 2 months before failing again. I could have it repaired again, but I’ve lost faith in the product. VitaMix won’t accept a return, and Amazon’s window for returns is 30-days. For years I thought I wanted a VitaMix. Boy, was I ever wrong. This has been an expensive lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Chuck Norris Blender
customer_reviews.text: If Chuck Norris was reincarnated as a blender...this would be it. It turns ice into snow and can liquify diamonds. I am thrilled to finally own one and expectations have been exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Hog

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered a 3rd Vitamix 5200. I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a 3rd Vitamix 5200. I have had two since 2001. They each lasted about 8 years with heavy use. I use them in a small Espresso bar and I figure they each blended 25,000 to 40,000 drinks each before dying. Through the years I would have to replace the blades when the bearings wore out on them, the plastic gear hub on top of blender when it stripped and the blender container once in a while because of cracks. I tried a Oster blender first and it didn't last a month. For home use the Vitamix should go for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Meyers

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old blender and brand new blender... Both performing the same!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender I've ever used. We've even tried a BlendTec... But each their own. We already had this same blender at home and I needed another for work. So I took the 8 year old blender to work and we have this new one at the house. The quality is the same between the two! With the right juice to produce ratio we are blending smoothies that are smooth enough the baby can sip it through a sippy cup. Well worth it for our attempt of a healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Called Vitamix and they hung up on me.
customer_reviews.text: I spent 500 on Amazon in May 2019. I've seen it under 300 here on the same listing. In August, the blade stopped spinning and support is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: I really wish this was a better review
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this item two times hoping that the second one would be better. It comes in a brown cardboard box - which makes it appear that they are refurbished (unlike the shiny colorful box you would get at a store). The motor keeps stopping after a few seconds of operation (on both of the ones I got). I've had cheap blenders before and they never had this issue. Not sure if I was unlucky twice or these are not the top of the line machines i was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: dasharofania

customer_reviews.title: I like it. My neighbors probably don't.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This thing is powerful and easy to use. More importantly, very easy to clean. My main use is to make fruit and veggie smoothies. I have decommissioned 2 smaller, bullet-style blenders which just don't have the power or quality. Noise is something to think about, though I would say that it should be expected with an industrial-quality product. It very much depends on what you are blending. Blending up 55 oz of a thick, frozen smoothie is going to make drastically more noise than just blending up a soup.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Had huge hopes for this product (with its lofty price tag). Disappointed beyond- constantly disengages, literally glides across my counter offer I amp it up over 1/2 power, takes several minutes to blend Even the lightest ingredients. Baby spinach smoothies come out looking like a chopped salad. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Umommi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender.
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a blendtec that we thought was a pretty good blender until we started making smoothies every morning, the blendtec just didn't live up to our expectations. we bought the Vitamix and we are completely thrilled with the capacity of the pitcher and the power that the blender has. It can blend anything that we put in it and it makes a fantastic smoothie! The blender is loud but is there a quiet blender?!
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Does what is claims.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. Did a side by side comparison with the other popular brand ( starts with a B) . everything that we put through the Vita mix blended as promised. The other blender could not even blend a raspberry shake well. It was full of seeds. The vitamix however blended smooth and creamy. go with the vitamix. You wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: yinyogini

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with any other blender
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to blenders, quality counts more than ever. I have a blender cemetery due to the large number of green smoothies my family consumes. I have tried all other brands trying to save a buck, but in the end I spent more than the cost of a Vitamix. Save your money and reduce waste - just buy the Vitamix first. It is hands-down the best blender on the planet! The engine power is in a class of its own, and you don't know how good home smoothies can actually taste until you blend them with this kind of power.
customer_reviews.author: James Trefry

customer_reviews.title: I feel great because the nutrition is extremely easy to absorb in ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my morning smoothies with a lot of greens have the consistency of water. I feel great because the nutrition is extremely easy to absorb in my body and I feel great everyday. I was eating pretty healthy before this but this really supercharged losing weight because yes it is kind of expensive so it made me want to get my money's worth and use it a lot which equals out to be much more fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jabronie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize I'd be using this blender every day.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Vitamix 5200 because I had a subscription to Daily-Harvest and needed a good blender to make their shakes. After getting bored with their offerings, I would still use the Vitamix to make my breakfast shakes or blend up a post-workout protein mix. Of all the kitchen hardware I've picked up over the years, this gets the most usage. For someone that practically lived off a George Forman Grill at college, that's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Graviton Matrix

customer_reviews.title: High quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: The Cadillac of mixers. I've had it for about 3 months and asking with my juicer have used it daily, so often in fact that my pots and pans have been retired. I've photographed some useful accessories for this Vitamix. Reusable large straws because some of the smoothies you make may be extra thick, plus a straw cleaning brush. A set of 4-8 glass jars for storage. The grey scraper is essential for pulling out all of the extra ingredients left under the blade. The long ',pusher' is essential to push bulkier ingredients down so all ingredients get mixed equally.
customer_reviews.author: Earthchild

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in February 2019 and it quit working in June 2019. I absolutely loved this blender and used it every other day. I have contacted Vitamix to see if there is any sort of warranty on it. If they do not offer one, I highly doubt I will repurchased this blender as I can't afford spending over $300 again on a blender.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This lasted for 1 hr before it stopping working. Sent it back. also too tall for under standard cabinets. I bought a BREVILLE Fast & Furious-- that's 10 stars! I use everyday 2 or 3 times for the smoothest protein & frozen fruit, kale, pb, oats, milk type smoothies, & hummus is super smooth also- never any foan either-- the blade design is perfect. So good for only $160..deal of the century>>>100% BREVILLE! .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Rocks!  Stop reading and just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Just get this thing. Stop mulling it over. Its the most amazing blender I've ever owned and use it daily. Soups, smoothies, sauces, margaritas, strawberry daiquiris (the best I've ever tasted BTW). Its a bit loud but it's to be expected considering the speed the blades are spinning. It literally puts a smile on my face every time I use it and crank it up to the highest speed and watch it just annihilate whatever I'm blending (using it on high is actually recommended by the company). Plus its American made and not sup-par Chinese BS you find at Target/Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: vitamix 520
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying an expensive blender. I was so thankful and happy. I needed to grind vegetables well because I had to eat a lot of vegetables while fasting intermittently. It's so well divided and the time is fast in two minutes. After grating the vegetables, the vitamix machine body... There is no need to add detergent and spin it. You can just use hot water. My husband also eats smoothies and is happy because they are soft and delicious. Thank God for allowing me to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: kyungheekim

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried to make hot soup since the weather is getting hot, but I have done several times making smoothie and homemade instant 'ice cream' especially the healthy version by swapping heavy cream to Greek yogurt or ice treat by adding crushed ice cubes. I know I can also do it on my food processor, but this is a high power blender and it will be my kitchen staple for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: WHY Didn't I just get this in the first place?!?
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. Until now I've never been able to make half decent smoothies at home. Everything else is an annoying compromise. This was the blender I wanted all along. Shame on me for being a cheapskate, there REALLY is a difference. Want REAL smoothies at home? This is the one. 100% Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: All kind of food preparation.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I just love it. I bought it originally for smoothies, but I have learned to use it in all kinds of food preparation. I follow vegan diet with no oil or extra sugar, and it was hard to find some products like hot sauce or hummus that do not contain those. But now I can make my own with my Vitamix!
customer_reviews.author: Riitta

customer_reviews.title: Smoking and vibrating when running on high.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vitamix 5200 Blender, Professional-Grade in February (10 months ago) and have only used it a handful of times. It has smelled like it was burning the motor every time I used it, even when I was just running pure liquid in it. I mostly used it to make a smoothie and just used it today to make banana pancake batter. It started smoking and then shut down. I finished blending the batter in my bullet so I know it wasn't a consistency issue. Many of my friends have Vitamix blenders and love them, maybe I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong blender!
customer_reviews.text: Vitamix makes a great blender. This is the no-frills 5200 model, with no fancy electronics. It does what it does, and it does it well! Great power, great blend! The container is very easy to clean out, as well. It works in well under half the time of our old blender, and does a far better job at the same time. Clean up is in a fraction of the time of our old blender, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months. No response from the company.
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard lots of great things about Vitamix, but the one I ordered stopped working after 6 months. I've written to the company twice via the service email on their website, but haven't received any response. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G Ellis

customer_reviews.title: A rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Does not blend. Frozen berries with milk, it cannot blend. Need to put in about 1/4 cup of frozen product with liquid and blend. Then add more frozen w liquid. This does not work. Tried w different foods and it’s does not work......
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how there is always a burning smell
customer_reviews.text: I have had this about 30 days and honestly I am not sure if it is worth the money. It's okay. I am not sure what I was expecting. I don't like how there is always a burning smell. I use this mainly for smoothies and yes once it gets going and you force things down it blends great. I just thought it would have more power
customer_reviews.author: Ilona B.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BLENDER / FOOD PROCESSOR
customer_reviews.text: VITAMIX BLENDERS ARE THE ABSOLUTELY BEST ON THE MARKET. SO VERSATILE. SOLIDS, LIQUIDS, SOUPS, ICE CREAM, ALL THE THE ABOVE WITH THIS! I LEFT NOISE LEVEL RATING BLANK, BECAUSE WITH THE HORSEPOWER THIS THING GENERATES, WHO CARES ABOUT NOISE. I BELIEVE ONE DAY, THEY'LL COME UP WITH AN ADAPTER AND I'LL REPLACE MY LAWNMOWER WITH THIS THING. IF YOU WANT QUIET, GO ORDER THE ONE THAT COMES WITH A FLIP COVER. THAT WOULD BE GREAT FOR THOSE WHO ENTERTAIN AND RESTAURANTS.
customer_reviews.author: Fr. Mark Niznik

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic
customer_reviews.text: At a time when I am trying to rid my home of as much plastic as possible, I do not want this item. My fault, I know. I should have checked more closely. I just could not have imagined that such a high end item would have a plastic bowl. I would expect to use this blender for many, many years so I do not feel it is a good investment given the material used.
customer_reviews.author: DDown reviews

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two days. Today I made Broccoli Soup. I used their recipe as a guide and used chicken stock instead of milk. It said I could use frozen broccoli so I did...and in 6 minutes I had hot soup. Of course we have always made smoothies; the Vitamix has made this so much fun. I saw a video and she used frozen grapes. This does not even compare with what we had been using. Just love it....
customer_reviews.author: Ferret Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find the perfect blender that can create smooth creamy smoothies to soups to ice creams. Vitamix is the best product out there. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: What an expensive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment for me. I waited for years to buy this, and watched it used a million times by youtubers. I scoured reviews. The first thing I tried to make was a simple blueberry banana smoothie, and I’ve bought $30 blenders that blend better than this. Maybe I just got a lemon, but I followed the directions they sent exactly. You want chunks of blueberry skin in your smoothie? Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: I Love Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vitamix of this particular model and my favorite. I have two other models, also, but this is my go to for performance and ease of use. I love this older container the best, too because it doesn't spill my smoothies as easily. This is a prime consideration since an accident damaged my left hand.
customer_reviews.author: lks

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. This thing will pulverize anything!! I ONLY wish it was a glass container instead, but it doesn't sway my review. We have smoothies every morning with gobs of frozen fruit,and a knob of real ginger that somehow just seems to melt.... I don't get it, but I don't care. Vitamix for life!
customer_reviews.author: MamaP

customer_reviews.title: Over promised and underdelivered
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to get a vitamix blender to replace my Ninja because everyone said it was so good. I've had this now for less than a year and wish I'd kept my old one. The mixing smoothies is good. However, for anything thick like salsa or pesto, it just swirls around leaving most unprocessed. I had expected glass or high quality plastic for the container. My plastic is pitted and discolored...never put in the dishwasher and was always hand washed. Don't purchase! Buy a Ninja instead for far less money!
customer_reviews.author: Anne F.

customer_reviews.title: I use it every single day for smoothies (SO much better than the best ninja and bullet)
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy this??? The cost kept me away, but for cost the other 2 lesser blenders I have bought, I could have been enjoying and using this! Duh!! I use it every single day for smoothies (SO much better than the best ninja and bullet), and it does so much more. Making soup is so easy and so tasty! Love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted a month for every other day use for making soups.
customer_reviews.author: MizzWicked

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Condition:New
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly used and NOT new. This is not what I purchased. There are/were finger prints and smudge stains and more evidently, did not come in an actual Vitamix box, but a regular cardboard box. Keywords: fake , used , wrong , mis , mislabel
customer_reviews.author: SmithWhileJohn

customer_reviews.title: What a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this Vitamix 5200 blender years ago when I first started looking at it. I love this thing! Great for making smoothies, nut butters and nut milks. No more ice chunks in my smoothies! Pretty easy to clean. Just follow the instructions provided. It’s not as loud as I thought it was going to be so that is an added bonus. The only thing is I wish it were easier to get the blended ingredients out from under the blades but with a little patience and persistence I eventually get it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Queen

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell
customer_reviews.text: This blender for the most part is awesome. But when you put frozen stuff berries in it, it made a gnarly burning smell and stopped. I think I should have bought a Blendtec. You live and you learn
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary luxury for typical blender user
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, this is the top-quality best blender you can get. But it’s still just a blender. That’s what it does, it blends. Marketing for this blender will tell you about all the amazing things that can do, but in the end they’re all a form of blending. I don’t think it’s worth the price for a person with typical blender use.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best blender I’ve ever had. It’s much quieter than I expected. It has a stick to push food to the blade. First couple uses it had a plastic/chemical smell I was concerned about but is now gone. Very easy to clean. The directions say rinse it out, fill with water and soap then run blender for a minute. Works perfectly and super easy. I really hope this last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I bought my Vitamix 4 months ago and it just broke, won't even turn on. For such an expensive piece of equipment I'm shocked the motor won't even turn on after just a few short months.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender a few years ago after quickly burning up another brand making smoothies (this recent purchase is a gift). This thing has power. It's easy to clean (you let the blender clean itself - see instructions). The only thing I don't like about it is that it is troublesome to scrape thick things out of it - the blades don't come off and you have to scrape around them. But then, you don't have to worry about it leaking at the bottom. In any case, that isn't enough to downgrade the rating for me.
customer_reviews.author: DuncanC

customer_reviews.title: Love at first blend!
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything and then some you wished your current blender could do! Puts the Ninja, Bullet, and all of this other “blenders” to shame, so irritated I wasted so much money over the years on those other blenders!!!!! Oh plus, it makes soup, as in oh look there’s steam rising up because I have hot soup! And those last bits of ice chunks in a smoothie? GONE - it’s like what is this kind of Magic?!?
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender.
customer_reviews.text: If I added up all the blenders I've had in my life it yeah would probably be quite a bit more money spent than what this blender cost. This is an awesome blender takes no time at all to blend smoothies or batter for waffles or whatever. I highly recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian p

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blender built to last
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Vitamix. I bought this as a Christmas gift to myself after wanting this blender a long time. I recoiled at the price for several years but now that I'd gone through 2 Nutri Bullets and an Oster Blender, I decided to just pay the extra money for this blender to avoid filling up the landfills with another junked blender every year. I did alot of research and expect this blender to be very versatile and to last many years. So far, I've made several Kale/Frozen Fruit shakes and it works so much better than anything I've ever had before, smooth as silk.
customer_reviews.author: E Huston

customer_reviews.title: The best blender
customer_reviews.text: I had a ninja blender, but as a barista who used vitamix blenders daily, I knew the ninja didn't really cut it. I wanted something with the blades on the bottom and attached to the pitcher itself and this blender is great. So far I've only used it to make smoothies and crepe batter but it's worked great. Super easy to clean, I just rinse it with water then Blend fresh water to clean it (but I have put it in the dishwasher as well). I have wanted a vitamix blender for a while and I can definitely see myself using this often. I also loved the recipe book included with it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh !! I'm so drill to get this machine it's a lifesaver for me As a cancer survivor This is what I will recommend to get your pure vitamins.. Expensive but worth it This is my second machine after 20 years..
customer_reviews.author: Laura m vivanco

customer_reviews.title: The best blender around
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this during the "deal of the day" at the best historical price I could find: $297. This blender is a steal at that price. I've had no issues with it so far. This blends everything I put in it with no issues--I have yet to need the tamper.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: One of the best blenders on the market
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing machine, does things you wouldn't even think about using a blender for ( even stuff like making flour or even making soup that's hot just from the blender) absolutely would recommend to almost anyone. It is pretty big and loud, but that's fine with me for all the stuff this can do
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vitamix for less than 2 years and barely used it (we’re talking once a month) until recently when I began using it once a week. Today, it died. I was blending a smoothie and all of a sudden I smelled burning plastic and it just stopped running. Not happy given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets with this purchase and wonder how I went so long without such a blender. I use it several times a week and look for recipes where I can find new uses. It makes noise but i've never had a blender that didn't make noise and it is powerful and quick so if the noise was a disturbance it would be for a very brief period of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves time, money, and taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been juicing for several years which is labor intense to prep and clean. Cost for produce is approx. $15-$30 to make a pitcher of juice (veggies/fruit). With Vitamix I pay $10-$15 to make a pitcher because it requires less produce using Whole Foods which does not waste the fiber (pulp). The prep and cleaning time went from 1-2 hours to only 10 minutes. The taste is actually much sweeter than juicing. The consistency is smooth like chocolate milk. If you prefer juice you can pour it inside a strainer or use a cheesecloth. It is still much faster using Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Radically improved my diet
customer_reviews.text: I make a huge smoothie every day now (filled to the brim!) Carrots and everything get liquified so easily. Can throw in all sorts of fruits, veges, seeds etc, but you need enough liquids too (i use water/soymilk/juice). Doesn't work great for thick dishes (think I need a food processor for that) but for smoothies there's nothing better. I eat so much better now and started losing weight again thanks to the daily smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: taekvideo

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix 5200 Professional
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to report that this has not been the most favorable experience. I had to return the first Vitamix that I ordered, as it was defective. This is my second go round and although I am a long time Vitamix devotee-(I purchased my first Vitamix 7 years ago) this one is sadly lacking in power and has problems blending a simple morning smoothie. Granted they have changed the design of the handle which makes it easier to keep clean but it is very loud (louder than my first) and not nearly as powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Turco

customer_reviews.title: Finally brought another one - after 30 years!
customer_reviews.text: My Vitamix that I received as a gift finally started making a loud noise after 30 years so I decided to purchase another one. Brought one that does not have the variable speed and has regretted that decision. So purchased another one with the variable speed. VARIABLE SPEED is an important option; I don't know why they took it off of some models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lo=ve my Vitamix. Definitely worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Love. But, that being said, I bought a refurbished one. and it stalls out periodically. When it just has liquid in it. So, I worry that it may not have a long life. But, it is the BEST blender (for now)
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Replicated juice, fast and easy to blend and clean
customer_reviews.text: I dislike grainy pulp smoothies and I have been a long time juicer. I am really impressed with the Vitamix’s ability to make my smoothies without pulp. It replicates juice, it’s fast, and easy to clean, which is what I wanted. The only fruit I have to chop up is the apple (in four pieces), it doesn’t break a whole apple down very well. However, I can live with that. The whole process takes me 5 to 7 mins- bye bye juicer!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: one of the best blenders you can buy
customer_reviews.text: a professional level product with clean simple industrial design, rugged durability and a very powerful motor. This model can do most anything you want it to, quickly and easily. The tamper helps when pureeing thick soups & the adjustable speed is handy in getting things moving and breaking apart without burping up. and clean up is easy. but one warning, the thing is tall & it is loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brendle

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is a Blender!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best addition to my kitchen! I can add anything to my smoothies - raw carrots, beets - and not a chunk to be found. Also, ice grinds up perfectly so you can turn fruit into sorbet. I love the variable speed control, too. It’s sturdy and, given the size, surprisingly quiet. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Denisa

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Vitamix but gave it to my ex spouse in the divorce settlement. Imagine my delight that the Black Friday deals would enable me to buy a new one for 1/2 of what I paid for a refurbished one about 7 years ago. Way to go. We are now back into making nutritious smoothies. Love this product and how Vitamix stands by their product. We had a recall on our older one and got a whole new blade assembly which was great since the blade was getting a little dull.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hamilton-Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Fast and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one vitamix. Blends really well. Got it on thanksgiving giving deal.. runs smooth. Very quick. Blends all my smoothie ingredients in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mehta

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really good blender
customer_reviews.text: It’s loud, but you gotta deal with that. Blends peanuts into wonderful peanut butter. Almonds need a dash of oil to turn into butter. Self cleaning works well for most smoothies, but not really for nut butters. Soup feature is cool but kind of inefficient. I just blend the ingredients and heat up on the stove. Overall, best blender I’ve ever owned. I really do love it, and the idea of having spend $300 on a blender makes me feel like I have to use it often, so I’ve been having smoothies pretty much everyday and have actually been feeling/looking a lot healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Erick F.

customer_reviews.title: Inspires Your to Live Healthier
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Blends all the raw fruits and vegetables I need and creates incredibly healthy smoothies. It's really easy to get a daily dose of raw fruits and veggies when you can just blend and drink them. Beets, carrots, apples and spinach are my favorite things to combine but you can be as creative as you want!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Vitamix yesterday and was eager to put it to the test, having spent hours online researching the product. It did not disappoint, to start, the delivery was more almost two weeks ahead of schedule, the product was exactly as described and very easy to assemble. In terms of its effectiveness, it blew me a way. It crushed ice into snow effortlessly and with the help of the plunging device, it blended up all ingredients in a few seconds. A great deal overall and an even better customer experience 👍🙌
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Solid blender
customer_reviews.text: I've made all sorts of things with it (soups, salsa, pina coladas, sherberts), and it is an absolute champ. They demo cleaning it by just running it with water and a drop of soap. Mostly cleans it but leaves a film, so you really still have to hand wash it. Otherwise, it is just slightly too tall with the lid on. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be so great for vegans, but the price! Even on sale! I have an Osterizer blender that I bought for much less and it does the job. I decided I don't need to have top of the line for how often I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brick Horse

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, then Watch the How To video.
customer_reviews.text: Insane. The things this blender can do. Have had it for 6 months and use it daily. Strong, durable, easy to clean. This blender is worth every penny. It does, however, sound like a jet is landing in your kitchen, but again it is worth it. I highly recommend you watch the DVD included to see how to best use this. It does't work exactly like the $20 blenders do.
customer_reviews.author: GHall

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Wife loves how well it purees her smoothies, to the point the kids even love to drink them. Best part, she says, is how easy it is to clean. Add some soapy water, slowly increase the powerto 10, and rinse. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: brad long

customer_reviews.title: Best blender on the market!
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best and most affective blender out there but it is much more expensive than the others. You get what you pay for! I love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in the performance of the blender
customer_reviews.text: have had cheaper blenders in the past that were much more powerful and easy to use. I tried using this multiple times with the same smoothie that i'm used to making and the blender had real trouble mixing it. It is also incredibly loud and moves around a lot on the surface of the kitchen. would not recommend especially at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothie making
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie almost daily and the vitamix is the best blender, hands down, for smoothie making. I put handfuls of frozen fruit and vegetables in the vitamix and the blender easily blends them into a smooth drink. No chunks. No bits of fruit or veggies left over. Pure liquid. I will say that one time my vitamix did overheat because I put too many frozen vegetables in it. However, after thirty minutes it cooled off and is now working fine. The shut off automatic mechanism in the blender is very helpful if it gets overheated. Overall, I love my vitamix and recommend it to anyone who makes smoothies or juices regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m a chef, so I am rough on kitchen appliances. This is the only blender that can keep up with me! Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it. Crushed ice with zero effort. Thickest power cord I've seen on any product - has to be a powerful motor. Wife likes the cleaning - fill 1/2 way with warm water, add a few drops of dishwasher soap and turn it on. That is it. I suggest not turning it up to the highest setting every time when doing shakes. Find the sweet spot right before it starts building an air pocket around the blade. The pusher tool works real good.
customer_reviews.author: vector_func

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: I have given this blender 6 months but this vitamix blender is not the best quality. When I try to blend any batters or even a slightly thicker smoothie the motor starts to burn. We can smell a horrible burning rubber smell coming from the blender. We no longer can use the "high" setting because of the burning. If you happen to hit the ratio of liquid to food just right it does blend well. This model is not at all easy to clean. It is too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Did I buy a overpriced blender...? :(
customer_reviews.text: Old blender always got things lodged in the bottom below and around blades. VitaMixer gets stuff lodged in the bottom below and around the blades. Difference is $400........ I was so excited to get one after wanting one for like 20+ years. Not sooooo impressed sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than our last Nutri Bullet
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a nutribullet for quiet sometime. It broke and since our whole household is always using it, we decided to upgrade. Worth every penny. The jug does just sit on the blender, but we have never had a mess. IT also is much larger than our previous, but it is quieter and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Happy and disappointed after 2 yrs of use
customer_reviews.text: We bought our vitamix on Nov 2017 and we were very happy with it until today when it overheated. Very disappointed and will be calling vitamix to find out how we can send it for repair. We use our vitamix to make smoothies on a regular basis as my family had been vegan/vegetarian for the last 7 yrs. Other than smoothies we used the blender lately to make our homemade hummus and the result is a smooth and perfectly delicious hummus, better than market bought hummus.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This machine was never quite right
customer_reviews.text: This machine has never worked that great...something always seemed wrong with the way it worked. Now it’s really bad and I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid Blender
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product... If you want a blender, that will blend like a pro, this is it. If you want a blender that emails, looks like a sports car, or has a sense of humor.... keep looking. This one... it chops shi$ up. Well. Peace!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Knight

customer_reviews.title: Wow such Power
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe this can make hot soup, because of how fast it spins and creates friction. Amazing!! It is somewhat loud but I guess it's all that power. Very happy with this blender and it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H Fern

customer_reviews.title: Verdict on quality is still out - Makes great smoothies, though!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this blender a few times each day since we bought it a little over a month ago. We have only made fruit protein smoothies with it...little bit of milk or coconut water, protein powder and frozen fruit. It seems that the blades get stuck at times and the motor sounds a bit off when that happens. We didn't expect that out of a vitamix, so we are thinking ours is just a fluke. Also, it is a bit louder than the noise level that is implied under thr description.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Berry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compared to the others
customer_reviews.text: This one does in 10 minutes what Ninja took us more than an hour... This definitely is one power-horse and does its job really swell well. If we knew about this product earlier, wouldnt have bothered to get a Ninja
customer_reviews.author: whatsinaname

customer_reviews.title: Super machine
customer_reviews.text: Better than a blender by far. Love this VitaMix. On my second one in 7 years. Hope to get another 5 yrs service from this current one. Much lower in price than the first one I owned so long ago! Same great machine. I mix daily smoothies which include hot cooked steel-cut oatmeal and frozen blueberries, whole fresh dates, pea protein powder as main ingredients. Thank you for a product I truly love! Wouldn’t be without a Vitamix!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne johnston

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just got this on November 24th, used only 3 times & it has stopped working, don't know if I was given a bad batch. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an avid cook for 40 years and always yearned for a Vitamix. After my latest inexpensive blender broke I ordered the Vitamix 5200 and it is worth every penny. The motor is powerful, it stays stable on the counter, and the tall, narrow shape keeps the contents rotating well with the blade. I can’t believe I waited this long and am thrilled to finally have it!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Get one now
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, dependable, quality product. "Well it better be for that price!", Says the wife. Expensive but better than buying cheap ones every year after they bust. Yes, it's loud, but so are my kids and I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these bad boys in professional kitchens for years. Nothing makes a silkier, smoother purée. If you have any issues, their customer service is incredible and their warranty is great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Minga

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly like what she expected
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift to my mom. She loves this product! It works perfectly like what she expected. She uses it to make a lot of veggie and fruit juice. This item come with accelerator/tamper tool and a recipe. I notice that they offer 7-year warranty. I think they are very confident of this product to give that warranty. Will probably buy one for myself when there is a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Wen H

product_meta.title: Vitamix 5200 Blender Professional-Grade, Self-Cleaning 64 oz Container, Black - 001372
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style Name:Blender

Vitamix fuels passions. It’s why we’re the brand most trusted by professional chefs. But you won’t just find us in restaurant kitchens. You’ll also find us in home kitchens around the world. Because whether you’re interested in the culinary arts, making healthier choices, or enjoying restaurant-quality smoothies at home—when you’re ready to move on and move up, when you’re ready to invest in your passion, you’re ready for Vitamix.

Built to Last
A bargain blender's not a bargain if it doesn't last. We know purchasing a Vitamix blender is an investment. But Vitamix blenders are built to last, helping you buy dependable, not disposable.

Easy to Clean
Just blend warm water and a drop of dish soap at your machine's highest speed, and watch it self-clean in 60 seconds or less - no disassembly required.

The Difference Is in the Blend
Since the number-one reason people purchase a blender is to make smoothies, it’s important to get them right. Whether you prefer an icy blend or a perfectly smooth purée, nutrition-packed with veggies or a light, fruity treat, Vitamix smoothies give you a delicious, even blend in every sip. 

Power
We don’t aim to have the highest horsepower. You don’t need more horses; you need trained ones. The focused power of our complete blending system causes every component of the Vitamix machine to work together, creating faster, smoother blends packed with flavor. 

The Universal Tool
Make smoothies & juices, hot soups, flours & dough, nut butter, frozen desserts, batters, dressings & sauces, non-dairy milks, and more. 

Manufactured in Cleveland, Ohio USA 

Troubleshooting All Vitamix Blenders include thermal sensors designed to shut the unit off when overheating. When this occurs, turn the power off for up to 45 minutes, allowing the blender to cool down or reset. Always check your speed: Vitamix blenders perform best on High speed to pulverize food and process thick mixture. Check the quantity and density of your blend. Follow the order of ingredients. Use the Tamper. When in doubt, refer to your owner’s manual for tips or visit the Vitamix homepage for techniques videos.”HP: 2-peak.
feature_bullets: Variable Speed Control: Easily adjust speed to achieve a variety of textures. The dial can be rotated at any point during the blend, so you’re in complete control
Large Batches: The size and shape of the self-cleaning 64-ounce container is ideal for blending medium to large batches. Design Feature : Radial cooling fan and thermal protection system
Hot Soup: The blades in the Vitamix container reach speeds fast enough to create friction heat, bringing cold ingredients to steaming hot in about six minutes
Hardened Stainless-Steel Blades: Our aircraft-grade stainless steel blades are designed to handle the toughest ingredients, so from the first blend to the last, you get the same quality results
Self-Cleaning: With a drop of dish soap and warm water, your Vitamix machine can clean itself in 30 to 60 seconds.
What's in the Box: motor base, 64 oz. container, getting started guide, DVD, classic tamper.Cord: 6 ft.Electrical Ratings: 120 V, 50/60 Hz, 11.5 Amps and HP- 2-peak

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
